facebook.title: Biodiversity Heritage Library: Humboldt and Bonpland’s Essai sur la géographie des plantes and...
facebook.summary: "Over 210 years after Alexander von Humboldt and Aimé Bonpland’s work titled Essai sur la géographie des plantes was published, climate science, book conservation, and botanical research have converged around this 1805 work. This book was digitized and mad
